class AEManualCopy(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)
        locationDir = "/_AE_ManualUploadRawFiles"
        
    def mergeAll(self):
        
        # for each file location in this manual upload directory..
        file_list = mssparkutils.fs.ls(self.stage1np + self.locationDir)
        for file in file_list:
            # ignore subfolders
            if file.isDir:
                continue
                
            # .. we need to dissect the filename to get the school name, area, semester number and year
            tokens = file.name.split("-")



    def _copyToFolder(self, file, destination):
        """ Moves the file to a folder that is based on the filename without its file extension"""
        tokens = destination.split(".")
        target = self.stage1np + '/' + tokens[0] +'/' + file.name
        mssparkutils.fs.mv(file.path, target, True) # will create the new dir and move file into it


# instantiate the datacopy with a source folder that contains all the ingested data files 
datacopy = DataCopy(source_folder)

datacopy.createFoldersForAll()
